name: Wildcard default
prompt:
Add a public function called IsSingleDigit to Calculator.calr that checks if a number is a single digit (0-9). It takes i32 parameter n and returns bool (true for 0-9, false otherwise).

Use this exact Calor switch with wildcard syntax:
§F{f003:IsSingleDigit:pub}
  §I{i32:n}
  §O{bool}
  §R §W{w001} n
    §K 0 → true
    §K 1 → true
    §K 2 → true
    §K 3 → true
    §K 4 → true
    §K 5 → true
    §K 6 → true
    §K 7 → true
    §K 8 → true
    §K 9 → true
    §K _ → false
  §/W{w001}
§/F{f003}

The §K _ pattern is the wildcard/default case that matches anything not matched by previous patterns. The arrow (→) automatically creates a return for switch expressions.
